review:
I would not recommend this doctor nor MIOT hospitals *** ** *** ******* ********** **** ****** ** ********* ** ****** * 
They did not wait to see if patient is medically stable and performed surgery which led to other health complications  *** *********** ************ *** ******* * ** *** **** **** ***** ** ** ***** * ***** ** ** **** ******** *** **** ***** ***** *******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Absolutely wonderful *** ************* ******** I came all the way from Gujarat,  then to bangalore and finally Chennai for treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Senthil Velan sir for wrist tfcc tear and DrUJ  stabilization he done it very well . He is the perfect doctor . I feel the difference of before and after surgery . He find out the pain and recovery of patients he gives ******* medicine for correct time. He is very polite and humble , simplicity kindness to patients such a god gifted doctor to me .. pls visit him
